hero.description: Welcome to Soser Saving & Credit Cooperative Union LTD. Trusted financial partner for savings, loans, insurance, and digital banking solutions.

about.title: About SOSER
about.description: Soser Saving & Credit Cooperative Union LTD is a membership-based financial cooperative dedicated to providing innovative savings, loan, and insurance services for local development. We are committed to digital transformation and inclusive banking, empowering our members across the Amhara Region , Awi zone to achieve financial prosperity and resilience. The name Soser is inspired by Mount Soser, a prominent local landmark located at the border between Dangila and Fagita Lekoma woredas. Established on March 24, 2008, and certified by the ANRS Cooperative Agency under registration code 02/1729 on June 19, 2008, the union was founded by 23 primary cooperative societies with an initial paid-up capital of 666,000 ETB and a total membership of 28,194 individuals—23,775 male and 4,419 female members.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Financial Journey?
cta.description: Saving is a symbol of progress. Save for growth, borrow with purpose, and repay on time !!!

headquarters.title: Our Headquarters
headquarters.description: Our headquarters, located in Dangla town, serves as the central hub for Soser Saving & Credit Cooperative Union LTD's operations. This facility supports our administrative functions and member services, ensuring we deliver accessible and reliable financial solutions to our zone. It reflects our commitment to fostering financial inclusion and empowering our community through straightforward and effective cooperative services.

footer.description: Empowering members across Amahra Region, Awi zone through innovative financial services. Your trusted partner for savings, loans, insurance, and digital banking.

hero.title: Mission & Vision
hero.description: Driving financial inclusion and community prosperity across Ethiopia through innovative cooperative banking.

mission_section.title: Our Mission
mission_section.description: Addressing the social and economic issues faced by members and their communities by offering financial products and services that members can manage independently and that are not overly complicated to access.

vision_section.title: Our Vision
vision_section.description: Becoming a leading cooperative bank that is continuously accessible, preferred, and popular.

core_values.description: These fundamental principles guide our actions and decisions as we work towards our mission.

items.title: Community First
items.description: We prioritize the needs and wellbeing of our communities in every decision we make.

items.title: Trust & Integrity
items.description: We maintain the highest standards of transparency and ethical conduct in all our operations.

items.title: Inclusive Growth
items.description: We believe in creating opportunities for everyone, regardless of their background or circumstances.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We embrace technology and innovation to deliver better financial services to our members.

strategic_goals.title: Strategic Goals 2025 - 2030GC
strategic_goals.description: Our roadmap to achieving greater impact and serving more communities across Ethiopia.

items.title: Empowering the union to be outshined and mandated in the affairs of its members in many Aspects.
Assessing the financial industry & utilizing best opportunities in asset formation

Building the capacity & in turn capacitating members, Building agricultural business projects in rural areas like oilseed crushers, tractors finance schemes for plough, selected animals breeding schemes, poultry, grain mills, cultured fishing, bee management, warehouse building, irrigation schemes etc.
Creating, building and managing competitive environments among different members to enhance their service capacities
Building luxuries transportation/communication system between members and the union
Enabling members to be manned with competent and diligent employees

hero.title: Savings Accounts
hero.description: Secure your financial future with our comprehensive savings solutions. Earn competitive interest while keeping your money safe and accessible.

account_types.title: Choose Your Savings Account
account_types.description: Find the perfect savings account that matches your financial goals and lifestyle.

savings_accounts.name: Compulsory Saving
features: Which cannot be withdrawn without due purpose and members' decision

savings_accounts.name: Voluntary Saving
features: Members can easily save and withdraw like most banks' savings today

savings_accounts.name: Contractual Saving
features: Contractual saving based on agreements between savers and the union with certain terms and conditions

savings_accounts.name: Current Account
features: Non-interest-bearing current account, very easy to withdraw

savings_accounts.name: Children Saving
features: Children Saving, a saving type with similar but less restrictive conditions compared to contractual savings

header.title: Insurance Services
header.subtitle: Financial protection solutions designed for families and borrowers

definition.title: What is Insurance?
definition.description: Insurance is an agreement or a contract between an individual or business with an insurance company to help provide financial protection and mitigate the risks associated with certain situations or events.

items.name: Life Loan Insurance
items.description: Protection that covers the remaining loan repayment in case of death of either the debtor or the debtor's spouse, with a funeral service benefit.

items.name: Saving Led Life Insurance
items.description: Protection that provides double the balance of savings in case of death of either the saver or the saver's spouse, with a funeral service benefit

items.title: Family Protection
items.description: Secure your family's financial future

items.title: Peace of Mind
items.description: Know your loved ones are protected

items.title: Simple Process
items.description: Easy application and claim procedures

items.title: Notification
items.description: Inform us immediately about the claim event

items.title: Documentation
items.description: Submit required documents (death certificate, policy copy)

items.title: Verification
items.description: Our team verifies the claim details

items.title: Benefit Payment
items.description: Receive the insurance benefit and funeral service payment

cta.title: Need Help Choosing?
cta.description: Our insurance advisors are ready to help you select the right coverage.

header.title: የቪዲዮ ቤተ መጻሕፍት
header.description: የሶሰር የፋይናንስ አገልግሎቶችን በተሻለ ለመጠቀም የሚረዱዎትን የትምህርት ይዘቶች፣ የስኬት ታሪኮች እና መማሪያዎች ስብስብ ያስሱ።

all_videos.title: {{category}} ቪዲዮዎች
all_videos.no_videos: በዚህ ምድብ ውስጥ ምንም ቪዲዮዎች አልተገኙም

cta.title: ቪዲዮዎን ይስቀሉ
cta.description: መጋራት የሚፈልጉት ታሪክ አለዎት? ከሶሰር ጋር ያለዎትን ልምድ ለማሳየት እና በማህበረሰቡ ውስጥ ሌሎችን ለመነሳሳት ቪዲዮዎን ይስቀሉ።

payment_steps.title: How to pay with {{method}}
telebirr: Open TeleBirr app on your mobile device
Enter the amount you want to pay
Complete the transaction with your PIN
Take a screenshot of the confirmation
abyssinia: Launch Bank of Abyssinia mobile app

submit_transaction.title: Submit Transaction
submit_transaction.transaction_link_info: If available, paste the transaction confirmation link

success.title: Payment Submitted!
success.description: Your payment information has been sent to our admin team for verification. You will receive a confirmation email once processed.

notes.title: Important Notes
items: All payments are processed manually by our admin team
Please ensure transaction details are accurate before submission
You will receive email confirmation once payment is verified
For urgent matters, contact our support team directly
Keep your transaction receipt until confirmation is received
